channel.title: Infinity, New stat System ( Dedicated server online 24/7!)
channel.description:
[b]Infinity is a new server with a Dedicated server. The server got a new stats system..
HERE i'll explain.[/b]
"The Stats System"
This system is for the fighting skills, and Prayer,Ranged, Magic.
The system work like this: If You have train to 60 attack, 60 defense, 60 strength etc - You can set ur stats from 1- 60..
::stats 1-60 1-60 1-60.
::prayer 1- to that level you have train.
::ranged 1- to that level you have train.
::magic 1- to that level you have train.
With this system, can you choose if you want to pk, with that stats you want.. (OFF THAT YOU HAVE TRAIN) And change stats if you want to DUEL.
* you can not set ur stats in WILDY* *you can not set ur stats in DUEL* *you can not get over that regular stats you have train* *if you have change ur stats and relog, it will say etc 60/ur regular stats.* *when you kill a npc, it goes back to regular stat.* ((..DONT FORGET TO PUT ::FATIGUE ON BEFORE YOU KILL SOMEONE IN WILDERNESS..))
This system will work well, IF you use it Correct :)
READ ON forums. if you dont understand.. or ask people ingame, if you cant belive the system:)
Thanks by ~INIFINITY~
New Domain will come soon (=
The stats.. The red means what ur stats can be up to. ^^ stats system.. [url=http://img511.imageshack.us/my.php?image=35777973jb1.jpg]http://img511.imageshack.us/my.php?image=35777973jb1.jpg[/url]
[img]http://img233.imageshack.us/my.php?image=34367120ve3.jpg]http://img233.imageshack.us/my.php?image=34367120ve3.jpg[/img]
New castle at Mage bank
[url=http://img258.imageshack.us/my.php?image=96703110ui9.jpg]http://img258.imageshack.us/my.php?image=96703110ui9.jpg[/url]
War place at Mage bank.. You can't walk there tho, have to be teled, contains A, B, C clans. [url=http://img71.imageshack.us/my.php?image=36506825kl7.jpg]http://img71.imageshack.us/my.php?image=36506825kl7.jpg[/url]
Some shops rest.
[url=http://img522.imageshack.us/my.php?image=11676003zj4.jpg]http://img522.imageshack.us/my.php?image=11676003zj4.jpg[/url]
[url=http://img522.imageshack.us/my.php?image=55105168ef7.jpg]http://img522.imageshack.us/my.php?image=55105168ef7.jpg[/url]
[url=http://img71.imageshack.us/my.php?image=14574613ds6.jpg]http://img71.imageshack.us/my.php?image=14574613ds6.jpg[/url]
[url=http://img244.imageshack.us/my.php?image=16352252rj0.jpg]http://img244.imageshack.us/my.php?image=16352252rj0.jpg[/url]
Client download at http://www.speedyshare.com/897463465.html
And read the info for forums.. And also not hard to train.
VIDEO!!
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=8D2tLgyOAUM]http://youtube.com/watch?v=8D2tLgyOAUM[/url]
[b]Thanks The Infinity Team.[/b]
